name: Santa's Revenge (Viasid)
description:
On the eve of Christmas, Grizzly, one of Santa's worst enemies, has developed a new virus that turns all New Year's creatures into a kind of zombie. Santa must, in order for this not to happen, deliver gifts and stop the spread of the virus, otherwise Christmas will not be saved

Now you need to run on roofs, fight infected elves with weapons, and distribute gifts
